publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2471 Brian Adam: Atlantic Telecom Collapse—That the Parliament regrets the sudden withdrawal of telephony services to thousands of Atlantic Telecom customers; calls on the Group’s administrators, in conjunction with the creditors, to restore the telephony services until alternative acceptable arrangements can be agreed, and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to Her Majesty’s Government, Oftel and the telecommunications industry to resolve outstanding issues, particularly the transfer of telephone numbers to the new service providers.
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Christine Grahame*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Shona Robison*

S1M-2471 Brian Adam: Atlantic Telecom Collapse—That the Parliament regrets the sudden withdrawal of telephony services to thousands of Atlantic Telecom customers; calls on the Group’s administrators, in conjunction with the creditors, to restore the telephony services until alternative acceptable arrangements can be agreed, and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make urgent representations to Her Majesty’s Government, Oftel and the telecommunications industry to resolve outstanding issues, particularly the transfer of telephone numbers to the new service providers. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Colin Campbell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Ms Sandra White*, Richard Lochhead*, Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*, David Mundell*, Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Irene McGugan*, Alasdair Morgan*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Nora Radcliffe*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2471 Atlantic Telecom Collapse (lodged on 21 November 2001) Fiona McLeod*
